properties.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 2:02AM MST until February 8 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches
at lower elevations, with 4 to 8 inches in the mountains and at
pass level. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front and Southern Rocky
Mountain Front.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY
